about_the_game:
Years have passed since the cruel experiments of Dr. Ethan Hastings. Deserted alleys, vandalism and curious observations. The government warns against entering this region.

But none of that matters to you. You love lost places and would do anything to discover new exciting places - no matter how dangerous the location may be.

You set off to explore the old Hastings Mansion. But what awaits you there is beyond anything you could ever have imagined.

Features:

  • Explore the Hastings Mansion after the events of the past
  • Find more exciting information about the research of Dr. Ethan Hastings
  • Investigate unknown locations and form your own impression of the effects on the environment
  • Use the advanced functions of your camera to discover hidden places and the secrets of this world

For questions, feedback or support requests join my Discord or write in the discussion section.

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains psychological horror, suicide scenes, family tragedies

name: Project Vic 2

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 4000 series or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 750 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
  • Sound Card: yes
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 4000 series or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 970 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
  • Sound Card: yes

short_description: Despite all the warnings, you are not afraid to enter the old Hastings Mansion. You put up with supernatural encounters to explore another of your beloved lost places. Once there, you discover things you never thought possible.
supported_languages:
English*, German
*languages with full audio support
